parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.04

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Markers

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Selects the fill texture for the marker ("RECTANGLE" or "ELLIPSE"). Brush is the name of the subclass in CfgMarkerBrushes.
<br>
<br>
''brush'' can be:
* "Solid"
* "SolidFull" (A3 only)
* "Horizontal"
* "Vertical"
* "Grid"
* "FDiagonal"
* "BDiagonal"
* "DiagGrid"
* "Cross"
* "Border" (A2/A3 only)
* "SolidBorder" (OA/A3 only)

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> markerName '''setMarkerBrushLocal''' brush

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> markerName: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> brush: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>"Marker1" [[setMarkerBrushLocal]] "DiagGrid";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setMarkerAlpha]], [[setMarkerAlphaLocal]], [[setMarkerBrush]], [[setMarkerColor]], [[setMarkerColorLocal]], [[setMarkerDir]], [[setMarkerDirLocal]], [[setMarkerPos]], [[setMarkerPosLocal]], [[setMarkerShape]], [[setMarkerShapeLocal]], [[setMarkerSize]], [[setMarkerSizeLocal]], [[setMarkerText]], [[setMarkerTextLocal]], [[setMarkerType]], [[setMarkerTypeLocal]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma1</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
